body_text:
We've had a few repeated prompt reports in the past (eg this), but unless my reading of Telemetry is very wrong (possible), this seems to be a more serious issue than I thought.
I noticed some repeated UUIDs in a non-repeated campaign, so I decided to generate a histogram of the number of dismissed prompt pings for the recipe on a per user bases.  Here's what I found:

We've had a few repeated prompt reports in the past (eg this), but unless my reading of Telemetry is very wrong (possible), this seems to be a more serious issue than I thought.

I noticed some repeated UUIDs in a non-repeated campaign, so I decided to generate a histogram of the number of dismissed prompt pings for the recipe on a per user bases. Here's what I found:

title: [Important] Heartbeat Prompt Repeating
body:
We've had a few repeated prompt reports in the past (eg [this](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1322425)), but unless my reading of Telemetry is very wrong (possible), this seems to be a more serious issue than I thought.

I noticed some repeated UUIDs in a non-repeated campaign, so I decided to generate a histogram of the number of dismissed prompt pings for the recipe on a per user bases.  Here's what I found:

| # Dismissals  |  # Users who dismissed N times  |  % Users who dismissed N times  |  % All Dismissals in Bucket  |
| -----  |  -----  |  -----  |  -----  |
| 1  |  8015  |  99.2%  |  96.0%  |
| 2  |  33  |  0.4%  |  0.8%  |
| 3  |  9  |  0.1%  |  0.3%  |
| 4  |  5  |  0.1%  |  0.2%  |
| 5  |  4  |  0.0%  |  0.2%  |
| 6  |  1  |  0.0%  |  0.1%  |
| 7  |  1  |  0.0%  |  0.1%  |
| 8  |  2  |  0.0%  |  0.2%  |
| 10  |  1  |  0.0%  |  0.1%  |
| 14  |  1  |  0.0%  |  0.2%  |
| 20  |  1  |  0.0%  |  0.2%  |
| 32  |  1  |  0.0%  |  0.4%  |
| 40  |  1  |  0.0%  |  0.5%  |
| 56  |  1  |  0.0%  |  0.7%  |

LMK if you have questions or would like to review the Gist.  Until investigated, this seems like a high priority issue.
I used this recipe 130 for this Spark job.
